channel.title: Structure on Helmize
channel.description: Recent content in Structure on Helmize

item.title: Multi YAML
item.description: Helmize supports multi YAML files (Multiple YAMLs in one file separeted by ). The implementation is relativ primitive: If a file contains it’s split into multiple sub files, which then are treated as seperated files for further processing. Limitation The fromYaml function can not parse multiple yaml files, but is aware of the delimiter. If you have the following example: {{- define "sample.data" -}} --- First: YAML --- Second: YAML {{- end -}} {{- $t := (fromYaml (include "sample.
